SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.services

Klasse UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.services.UserServiceImpl
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
UserService, HasLogger
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService, HasLogger
The UserServiceImpl class is an implementation of the UserService interface that provides a set of methods for managing user data in the application, such as adding, updating, and deleting users. This class is also responsible for validating user data before storing it in the database. It uses the UserRepository class to interact with the database and perform CRUD operations.
Seit:
16-01-2023

  • Methodendetails

    • addUser

      public User addUser(User user) throws RuntimeException
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Angegeben von:
      addUser in Schnittstelle UserService
      Parameter:
      user - A DTO representing the user to be added.
      Gibt zurück:
      The added user as a DTO.
      Löst aus:
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if the user already exists in the database.
      EmailHasToBeUniqueException - if the email address is already taken
      UserNotValidException - if the user is not valid
      PasswordNotValidException - if the password is not valid
      RuntimeException - if a problem occurs while adding the User.

    • findAll

      public List<User> findAll()
      Retrieves all users from the database.
      Angegeben von:
      findAll in Schnittstelle UserService
      Gibt zurück:
      A list of all users as DTOs.

    • updateUser

      public User updateUser(User user) throws RuntimeException
      updates an existing user in the database.
      Angegeben von:
      updateUser in Schnittstelle UserService
      Parameter:
      user - A DTO representing the user to be updated.
      Gibt zurück:
      The updated user as a DTO.
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist in the database.
      EmailHasToBeUniqueException - if the email address is already taken
      UserNotValidException - if the user is not valid
      PasswordNotValidException - if the password is not valid
      RuntimeException

    • login

      public User login(User loginUser)
      This method is used to log in a user. It takes in a User object as a parameter and checks if the email address and password match those in the database. If the email address and password match, the user is logged in and their information is logged in the system. If the password does not match, a PasswordNotValidException is thrown.
      Angegeben von:
      login in Schnittstelle UserService
      Parameter:
      loginUser - - A User object representing the user attempting to log in.
      Gibt zurück:
      - The User object representing the logged in user.

    • delete

      public User delete(User user)
      Deletes a given user from the database. Also deletes all categories associated with the user before deleting the user itself. Logs the deleted user's details (email, username, and first name). Returns the deleted user's details.
      Angegeben von:
      delete in Schnittstelle UserService
      Parameter:
      user - the user to be deleted
      Gibt zurück:
      the deleted user's details
      Löst aus:
      Exception - if the user is not found in the database

    • getUser

      public User getUser(User user) throws UserNotFoundException
      This method checks if a user with the provided userId exists in the userRepository.
      Angegeben von:
      getUser in Schnittstelle UserService
      Parameter:
      user - the user that is to be checked for existence
      Gibt zurück:
      true if a user with the provided userId exists in the userRepository, false otherwise.
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if the User with the given User object is not found.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(long userId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: UserService

      Parameter:
      userId - The ID of the User to be retrieved.
      Gibt zurück:
      The User object with the given ID.
      Löst aus:
      UserNotFoundException - if the User with the given ID is not found.
